cf.CoordinateBounds.flip¶

CoordinateBounds.flip(axes=None, i=False)[source]¶

Flip dimensions of the data array in place.

See also

expand_dims, squeeze, transpose

Parameters:
axes : (sequence of) int

Flip the dimensions whose positions are given. By default all dimensions are flipped.
Returns:

out : cf.CoordinateBounds
Examples: 
>>> f.flip()
>>> f.flip(1)
>>> f.flip([0, 1])

>>> g = f[::-1, :, ::-1]
>>> f.flip([2, 0]).equals(g)
True
